name: Demon Days
description:
Entry for Survive the Game Jam 5.

Demon Days is a top down shooter in which you need to be constantly picking up water and food to survive while you fight demons that always resurrect back to life.

Credits

Dock - Pixel Art

Kevin MacLeod - Music - https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/?genre=horror

LeMudCrab - SFX - https://freesound.org/people/LeMudCrab/sounds/163456/

Southype - Font - https://www.1001freefonts.com/satanic-demoniac-st.font

Junkohanhero - Font - https://www.1001freefonts.com/quiet-horror-story.font
